page.title: 03 BRADWAY
page.content: The village of Bradway lies just to the north of the northern Derbyshire border.It has kept much of its character as a village,although it now lies within the boundary of Sheffield. Much of the housing is private and either semi_detached or detached,in a variety of styles, some of it looking out over open countryside and farmland into Derbyshire. The people who live here are served by two parades of small shop and bus servies into the centre of Sheffield. primary school has closed down due to the small number of children, but the majority of 100 older people who are now living in Bradway are very well looked after in recreation. There is a golf club, a golf range, bowls club and community centre.
